text: (nabiye! ovunta dharmaya pahala kala) e andamatama api obata (mema) dharmaya pahala kara ættemu. ebævin api kavurun hata (pera) dharmaya laba di ættemuda, ovun(gen vu satyavantayin) meyada (mema dharmayada anivaryayen) visvasa karannaha. tavada (arabivarun vana) movungen (sadharana buddhiyen yutu) samaharunda meya visvasa karannaha. (sitata noekangava pratiksepa karana) kafirvarun hæra, (an kisivekut) apage ayavan pratiksepa nokarannaha
